com.compendium.ui.edits
Class ArrangeEdit

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.undo.AbstractUndoableEdit
      com.compendium.ui.edits.PCEdit
          com.compendium.ui.edits.ArrangeEdit
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.undo.UndoableEdit
public class ArrangeEdit
extends PCEdit

This class holds the data for an arrange, so it can be undone/redone.

Author:
? / Michelle Bachler
